description: ff. 214. 200 x 153mm. 18 lin. Yazd, Jumādá I, 1230 H., Muḥammad Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Yazdī. Commentary on Aḥmad ibn Zayn al-Dīn al-Aḥsāʼī's Fawāʼid. Incip.: ... اما بعد فىقول ... محمد بن محمد نصىر الجىلانى انى بعد الفراغ
